recipe

Get out the following ingredients:

olive oil 1 Tbsp
popcorn 4 Tbsp
dash seasoning 1 unit
salt 1 unit
Show Ingrendients Show All Steps

Estimated Time: 5 Minutes

Recipe:

Put 1 Tbsp olive oil in pot
Turn stove to heat 4 (Takes 4.5 minutes)
Put in 4 Tbsp popcorn
Cook until popped (write this down)
Season with dash seasoning salt
FINISHED
